processDesc: Process to show real time information of Reporting Data coming from VCS to VDM
Process to show the real time information of Premium File extract Process
Process is looking at the VDM data while we are loading it, applying issuer business rules and generating email notifications through VCS
Single source of all the cardholder data of VDM subscribed bank.
We have acquirer,issuer,merchant and cardholder level Daily, Monthly and quaterly aggregates
